Tucson could barely stand up now. Talon's suggestion made per=
fect sense. Slowly, he slides back down to his knees and down again, sittin=
g against the wall, with his head leaning back against it. He closes his ey=
es to try and ease the dizziness he was now feeling as his internal gyrosco=
pic system goes haywire from Lamia's attack.

"Not - a bad idea. Ughhhh... =
My Equalibrium is all thrown off.. Slag, I hate it when I'm rendered disabl=
ed." 

Tucson always prided himself on being a tough guy, able to handle st=
icky situations on his own. This time however, he had to admit that not all=
 tough guys can get away unscathed.
